title: Mediterranean stuffed vegetables
ingredients: ['100 g (3½ oz) long-grain rice', '250 g (8½ oz) lean minced lamb', '1 onion, chopped', '4 peppers', '4 beefsteak tomatoes, ripe but firm', '1 large courgette, about 225 g (8 oz) each', '1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '3 garlic cloves, coarsely chopped', '170 g (6 oz) baby spinach leaves', '2 tbsp shredded fresh basil', '1 egg, lightly beaten', 'salt and pepper', 'To serve', '2–3 tbsp shredded fresh basil']
